question_en: When is the last date to pay semester fees?
answer_en: The last date to pay semester fees is 31st July 2025.

question_en: How can I apply for scholarship?
answer_en: You can apply for scholarship by filling the form available at the Accounts Office or college website.

question_en: Where can I see my timetable?
answer_en: Your timetable is available on the college notice board and official website.
